column4: in evolution there are some huge pop mail caches that seem to grow and row ... anyone know how to contain this?
delete them
I reported a bug about it.  after a year or so - it was confirmed, yay!  :)
is this possible within evolution?
no, evolution is broken in that respect
ah ok
well done on getting bug accepted
thanks.  it's not easy with the ubuntu people
do you have the bug identifier?
I've not had it accepted by the gnome folks yet though: http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=356456 - but it's only been 16 months
snap :D
the ubuntu bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/evolution/+bug/21668
the bug in evolution, since 2003: http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=246213
